name: Wizard and Son
description:
The grand Wizard has become too sick to do anything. He wants to die in peace, and thus sets on a small adventure with his sons to a dark corner of his catacombs.

Controls:

Arrows - Move 

Space - Jump

X - special actions

R- restart

Credits: Made by Skvader418(me) in 4 days for the Gdevelop game jam
